bill.summary: 4/28/1994--Introduced. Public Housing Improvement Act of 1994 - Amends the United States Housing Act of 1937 to repeal the public housing demolition one-for-one replacement requirement. Permits the use of modernization funds for cost-effective new construction. Directs the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to transfer the management of chronically troubled public housing agencies to private management.
